Generation IX.Scarlet: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.
Generation IX.Violet: The sweet scent its body gives off mesmerizes those around it. The scent grows stronger when this Pokémon is in the sun.

Generation IX.Scarlet: First partner Pokémon from Clavell in Cabo Poco
Generation IX.Violet: First partner Pokémon from Clavell in Cabo Poco
